member.name: T:Mscc.GenerativeAI.Google.GenerativeModelGoogle
member.summary: Helper class leveraging Google API Client Libraries. OAuth 2.0 credential for accessing protected resources using an access token, as well as optionally refreshing the access token when it expires using a refresh token.

member.name: P:Mscc.GenerativeAI.Google.GenerativeModelGoogle.ProjectId
member.summary: Gets or sets the project ID for the service.

member.name: P:Mscc.GenerativeAI.Google.GenerativeModelGoogle.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets the region for the service.

member.name: M:Mscc.GenerativeAI.Google.GenerativeModelGoogle.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor via user credentials using client ID and secret.

member.name: M:Mscc.GenerativeAI.Google.GenerativeModelGoogle.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor via service account using its email address.

member.name: M:Mscc.GenerativeAI.Google.GenerativeModelGoogle.CreateModel(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an instance of the specified model.
